statements.sql: select * from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `payment_gateway_currencies`.`payment_gateway_id` in (8) order by `id` desc
select * from `user_wallets` where `user_id` = 1 and exists (select * from `currencies` where `user_wallets`.`currency_id` = `currencies`.`id` and `id` = 1) limit 1
select * from `user_wallets` where `user_id` = 1 and exists (select * from `currencies` where `user_wallets`.`currency_id` = `currencies`.`id` and `id` = 1 and `status` = 1) and `status` = 1 limit 1
select * from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `payment_gateway_currencies`.`payment_gateway_id` in (8) order by `id` desc
select * from `user_wallets` where `user_id` = 1 and exists (select * from `currencies` where `user_wallets`.`currency_id` = `currencies`.`id` and `id` = 1) limit 1
select * from `user_wallets` where `user_id` = 1 and exists (select * from `currencies` where `user_wallets`.`currency_id` = `currencies`.`id` and `id` = 1 and `status` = 1) and `status` = 1 limit 1
